creator: Demand Media Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Scratch Magazine - The Forum For All Nail Professionals.

Projecting a global perspective, enjoy cutting edge information and style ideas as they emerge alongside the most exciting innovations as and when they occur, in the Nail Industry.

Whether it’s a technological breakthrough, a new art form, achievement or award, Scratch Magazine is the voice of the Nail nation and will continue to grow its repertoire to reflect current trends and industry action.

Read and enjoy all aspects of Scratch Magazine through the App such as:
• The Great Scratch Shoot Out
• Nailympics London
• Olympia Beauty
• Gloss Magazine- A bi-annual consumer-focused journal to complement its trade offering.

The Nailympics London is the biggest event on the calendar attracting a massive crowd of Nail Industry professionals, leaders, competitors and viewers. All the details can be found on the App easily for up to date news and pics!

Gloss Magazine is designed to support the Nail Industry by inspiring its readers to experiment with new nail concepts in the salon. Exciting its readers through colour, style and design ideas, Gloss delivers the trend and fashion element of this industry directly to the client in order to keep business buoyant and give clients a better insight into what the nail industry has to offer them.

Gloss Magazine is now available to salons at £1 a copy (+ postage) in bundles of 10 for counter top retail purposes and available through the Scratch Magazine website at https://www.scratchmagazine.co.uk

Scratch Magazine is leading the way for Nail Professionals globally with the latest news, designs, trends, products, people and nail artists. They are now leading the way with an App to enable you to access the magazine, the website and all the details of the Nailympics London competition whenever you like and wherever you are.

Receive Special Offers on subscriptions- online and hard cover copies.

Features:
One click access to all aspects of the Scratch website including:
• All the latest news and information from the Nail Industry
• Up to date competition news and highlights,
• Olympia Beauty show details and online bookings/free tickets
• Scratch magazine online subscriptions
• Social media links to Scratch on Facebook and Pinterest
• Scratch Shop
• Scratch Shoot Out Competition highlights/winners
• Back issues of Scratch readable through the App
• Complete Scratch cover library

Instant access to all the details of Nailympics London and the Olympia Beauty Show including:
• Competition rules
• Latest news, details and costings
• Itinerary
• Registration Forms
• Venue details
• Travel and Accommodation details
• Judges, Sponsors and Advertising
• Olympia Beauty Show
• Educators and exhibitors
• Meet the team

A full gallery of readers Nail Art in our Nail Art Gallery section, and the ability to send in your design to us through your app.

Special offers on subscriptions- online and hard cover copies. Be kept up to date through our notifications directly to your mobile device and be in the loop on the latest Nail Trends and styles.

Whether you are a Nail Professional, an educator, a supplier or a competitor at the Nailympics London- this App will keep you in touch with what’s happening in the Nail World with the latest news and images of the newest styles and trends.
descriptionShort: Read and enjoy all aspects of Scratch Magazine through the App
